name: ROLUSTECH
tag_list: sugarcrm, sugarcrmcustomization, sugarcrmconsultancy, joomla, opensource, sugarcrmimplementation, sugarcrmservices, sugarcrmexperts, outsourcingpartners, sugarcrmdevelopment, opensourcecrm, cmswebsite, webdevelopment, opensourceconsultancy
overview:
Rolustech offers expert SugarCRM Consultancy: Customization, Integration and Implementation services.

SugarCRM is the leading commercial open source Customer Relationship Management (CRM) software for companies of all sizes. The increasing need for companies to keep customers completely satisfied has resulted in the popularity of CRM software applications like SugarCRM.

SugarCRM allows you to increase your sales, expand your marketing horizon and keep your customers completely satisfied. We at Rolustech realize the importance of successfully implementing SugarCRM in the modern business world.

RolusTech consists of a team of highly qualified and dedicated individuals with an interestingly proficient mix of professional backgrounds.

Our core focus is solely on SugarCRM and our team of expert SugarCRM Consultants has extensive experience in mapping the business requirements of businesses in almost all industries onto SugarCRM.

Our comprehensive SugarCRM solutions can range from Business Process Consultancy for helping the clients in understanding, gathering and mapping their requirements onto the SugarCRM system to Technical Development and Support for Customizations, Integrations, Custom Module building and Implementation of SugarCRM.

We can provide SugarCRM solutions directly to the end user of the system or to an intermediary SugarCRM implementer as their outsourcing partner.
